name: Vegan Banana Bread
description: If you like the combination of chocolate and banana, you will love this vegan banana bread with chocolate and chopped hazelnuts. It's perfectly sweet, incredibly moist, super easy to make, and so delicious. The best banana bread ever!
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup oil  (vegetable oil, canola oil, or coconut oil )

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the bananas and place them on a plate or cutting board. Mash them with a fork. Preheat the oven to 350 °F.
recipeInstructions.name: Peel the bananas and place them on a plate or cutting board. Mash them with a fork. Preheat the oven to 350 °F.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the flour, the baking powder, the brown sugar, and the ground hazelnuts ingredients in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine the flour, the baking powder, the brown sugar, and the ground hazelnuts ingredients in a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mashed bananas, the maple syrup, the oil, and the chocolate chips.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the mashed bananas, the maple syrup, the oil, and the chocolate chips.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir with a wooden spoon until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir with a wooden spoon until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a loaf pan with vegan margarine or coconut oil or line it with parchment paper. Pour the batter into your prepared loaf pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Grease a loaf pan with vegan margarine or coconut oil or line it with parchment paper. Pour the batter into your prepared loaf pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake the banana bread for 40 minutes. Let it cool off. Melt the chocolate either in the microwave or on the stovetop. Pour it on top of the banana bread and sprinkle with the chopped hazelnuts.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake the banana bread for 40 minutes. Let it cool off. Melt the chocolate either in the microwave or on the stovetop. Pour it on top of the banana bread and sprinkle with the chopped hazelnuts.
